experiences.company: Commonwealth Department of Elementary and Secondary Education
experiences.detail: Technologies: Java, AngularJS, Hibernate, Spring, REST, Teamsite, Linux, Oracle, JIRA, GIT</br>Responsibilities: Implemented offering monitoring function; Supported on the videos, images and other kinds of media deployment, monitored workflows status; Diagnosed and identified root cause of incidents; Escalated and collaborated with other teams to fix issues in time; Reported weekly outstanding production incidents to VP.</br>Challenges: Worked under intense environment; Solved production incidents ASAP; Turned over to teams that in another time zone.</br>Summary: Resolved issues on time; Ensured delivery go live to all platforms as scheduled; More than one million HBO users could watch subscribed content on time.

Technologies: Java, AngularJS, Hibernate, Spring, REST, Teamsite, Linux, Oracle, JIRA, GIT</br>Responsibilities: Implemented offering monitoring function; Supported on the videos, images and other kinds of media deployment, monitored workflows status; Diagnosed and identified root cause of incidents; Escalated and collaborated with other teams to fix issues in time; Reported weekly outstanding production incidents to VP.</br>Challenges: Worked under intense environment; Solved production incidents ASAP; Turned over to teams that in another time zone.</br>Summary: Resolved issues on time; Ensured delivery go live to all platforms as scheduled; More than one million HBO users could watch subscribed content on time.
